title: One Night With a Rock Star
description: It's Anne of Green Gables meets Rattle & Hum. Worlds collide.When Esther was a young teen with frizzy hair and too-skinny legs, Sky's music soothed her through awkwardness and pain. During the Glam-Rock 80s, Esther is a college journalism student and fledgling print model. One chance meeting with her superstar crush rocks both their worlds.Will Esther's deep roots in family and faith keep her feet on the ground when a tornado named Sky blows her world apart?
author: Chana Keefer
